value.text: Buy DroneX
FAQ

value.labelText: Product
What is the weight of DroneX?

value.text: The standard weight of the aircraft (including battery, propellers, and a microSD card) is 242 grams. Check local rules and regulations before use.

value.labelText: Does DroneX support panorama?

value.text: By pressing the High-Speed Rotation button on remote, the drone will spin automatically at certain height. No need to hold the direction throttle all the time now.
